abstract: Wal-Mart will cut prices to lure shoppers to the store before the traditional early opening on the Friday after the holiday.
snippet: Wal-Mart will cut prices to lure shoppers to the store before the traditional early opening on the Friday after the holiday.
lead_paragraph: With major retailers, including Kohl’s, Macy’s, Target and Best Buy, saying they will open at midnight on Thanksgiving this year to offer holiday deals, Wal-Mart is trying to do them one better. It is expected to announce Thursday that it will start deals at 10 p.m. on Thanksgiving Day nationwide.

headline.main: Wal-Mart to Start Its Sales at 10 P.M. on Thanksgiving
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart to Start Its Sales At 10 P.M. on Thanksgiving
